block.p: TUFANO-Pascal. Of New Springville, S.I., on Sept 10, 2000. Beloved husband of Rosa. Loving father of Doctors Ralph and Sylvia Tufano. Dear brother of Steve, Sal, Manny, Joe and John Tufano, Christina Caliendo, Elsie Papadoupolous and Irene Tufano Tomassetti. Funeral from Matthew Funeral Home, Inc., 2508 Victory Blvd at Willowbrook Road, S.I. on Wednesday 9AM. Mass of Christian Burial Our Lady of Pity Church 9:30AM. Interment Ocean View Cemetery. Friends may call Tuesday 2-4:30 and 7-9:30.
